title: Moon man (K)
creator_credit: Gene Deitch, Morton Schindel, Zdenka Deitchova, Weston Woods Studios and Kratky Film
brief_description: Animated version of the children’s book by Tomi Ungerer, which tells of the adventures that befell a man from the moon. Bored with his lonely life on the Moon, he decides to join the fun on Earth.
creator_credit_for_label: Gene Deitch, Morton Schindel, Zdenka Deitchova, Weston Woods Studios and Kratky Film
